tutorial: 3. Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage

definition.text: Errors are always tied to a specific point in time, that is, to a specific candle!

paragraphs.text: When the Trading Bot runs a trading session, it applies the definitions in the trading system candle by candle, one at a time. The bot doesn't know what lies ahead... it only knows the current candle, that is, the candle that is being evaluated.
When an error occurs, it is handled by the trading bot, and the error is saved with the timestamp of the candle where it happened. This is how you get to know exactly what errors happened when.
